QuestData.Title: Born to Shred
QuestData.Description:
I've got this prototype shredder operating on most cylinders.
Boy, will they be surprised when you stomp them with their own machine!
Can't wait to watch you from the safety of the Observicopter.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $2oa Iron Horde in Tuurem using the Iron Shredder.
QuestData.CompletionText: You've got a license to shred!

Objectives.Objective: Take control of the Iron Shredder
